intro: Stemonurus heyneanus, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact growth habit and vibrant, showy flowers. The plant typically produces clusters of small, tubular flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white, which bloom throughout the year under proper care.
